comments.text: Despite such tragedy a genuinely uplifting article. You can only wish him success.

replies.text: This post has been removed.

comments.text: It’s really nice to hear the backstory of these players. It also shows how cricket has changed when a players path to test is through the IPL. I hope he is successful, but only after the oval.

In a country of over a billion people.
Where there is so much poverty and towns which are disconnected from large populous hubs.
How do they ensure players like Deep don’t slip through the net.

Surely they must have had some brilliant players slip through over the years.

Fair play to him.
Hope he continues to develop and do well.
